Title: Extends certain provisions of the real property tax law for persons over the age sixty-five and older and for certain persons with disabilities for one year due to the novel coronavirus, COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Authorizes every local municipal assessor to extend the renewal of certain provisions of the real property tax law for persons age sixty-five and older or for certain persons with disabilities and limited income for one year in the interest of public health and safety due to the novel coronavirus, COVID-19 pandemic; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to extending the renewal of certain provisions of the real property tax law for persons age sixty-five and older or for certain persons with disabilities and limited income for one year due to the novel coronavirus, COVID-19 pandemic
